word: The God Given Personality of Men--The man-ruling power that has been coming into our ranks has no sanction in the word.  Satan has stolen in to lead men to depend on men, and to make flesh their arm.  I am instructed to say, Break every yoke that human invention has framed, and heed the voice of Christ, "Take My yoke upon you, and learn of Me; for I am meek and lowly in heart; and ye shall find rest unto your souls: for "My yoke is easy, and My burden is light."
